workflow.name: Automated cold email campaigns with random templates & Google Sheets tracking
workflow.description:
# üìä Google Sheets Leads ‚Üí üé≤ Random Templates ‚Üí ‚úâÔ∏è Personalized Emails ‚Üí üìù Status Tracking

## What this workflow does

- üìä Reads leads list from Google Sheets (Name, Email, Send Status)
- üîç Filters out already-contacted leads (skips "SENT" status)
- üé≤ Randomly selects email template from template library
- ‚úèÔ∏è Personalizes subject and body with lead's name
- üìß Sends emails one-by-one with delays between sends
- ‚úÖ Updates Google Sheet with send status and timestamp
- üîÅ Loops through all unsent leads automatically

## Why it's useful

- ‚ö° Automate cold outreach without manual copy-paste
- üéØ Avoid duplicate sends‚Äîtracks who's been contacted
- üìù Rotate email templates for A/B testing and variety
- üë§ Personalization makes emails feel human, not spammy
- ‚è±Ô∏è Built-in delays prevent spam flags and rate limits
- üìä Full audit trail of who received what and when

## How it works

- üìä Google Sheets (Leads) ‚Üí reads Name, Email, Send Status
- üö¶ IF Node ‚Üí filters leads where Send Status ‚â† "SENT"
- üîÑ Loop Over Items ‚Üí processes leads one-by-one
- üìß Google Sheets (Templates) ‚Üí fetches Subject + Body templates
- üé≤ Code Node ‚Üí picks random template
- üîÄ Merge ‚Üí combines lead data with template
- ‚úèÔ∏è Edit Fields ‚Üí replaces [Name] with actual lead name
- üì® Send Email ‚Üí delivers personalized message
- ‚è≥ Wait ‚Üí adds delay between sends (avoids spam flags)
- ‚úÖ Google Sheets (Update) ‚Üí marks as "SENT" with timestamp

## What you'll need

- üìä Google Sheet #1: Leads (columns: Name, Email, Send Status, Time)
- üìß Google Sheet #2: Templates (columns: Subject, Body)
- üì¨ SMTP credentials (SendGrid, Mailgun, etc.)
- üîê Google Sheets OAuth

## Setup steps

- üìä Create "Leads" sheet with columns: Name | Email | Send Status | Time
- üìß Create "Templates" sheet with columns: Subject | Body (use [Name] placeholder)
- üîó Connect Google Sheets OAuth credentials
- üì¨ Add SMTP email credentials
- üß≠ Update both Google Sheets node IDs to point to your sheets
- ‚öôÔ∏è Set "From Email" in Send Email node
- üß™ Test with 2-3 test leads first

## Customization ideas

- ‚è±Ô∏è Adjust Wait time (30s-5min) to control send rate
- üìä Add click tracking with UTM parameters
- üîî Send Slack/Telegram notification when campaign completes 
- üéØ Add lead scoring‚Äîprioritize high-value leads first
- üìà Log opens/replies to separate tracking sheet

## Who it's for

- üßë‚Äçüíª Freelancers doing cold outreach to agencies
- üìà Sales teams running lead generation campaigns
- üöÄ Startups reaching out to potential customers
- üéØ Marketers testing email copy variations
- üíº Business developers nurturing prospect lists

## Quick Setup Guide

- Before You Start - What You Need:
üìä Google account for Sheets access
- üìß SMTP email account (Gmail, custom domain, or email service)
- üìù List of leads (names + emails)
- ‚úâÔ∏è Email templates ready (with [Name] placeholders)

## Want help customizing?

üìß anirpoke@gmail.com
üîó LinkedIn

parameters.content: ## Get Leads Data From Google Sheet
## Get Email Templates From Google Sheet

## ‚öôÔ∏è SETUP CHECKLIST
1. Create Leads sheet: Name | Email | Send Status | Time
2. Create Templates sheet: Subject | Body (use [Name])
3. Connect Google Sheets OAuth
4. Connect SMTP credentials
5. Update all Google Sheets node IDs
6. Set "From Email" in Send email node
7. Set Wait time (30-120 seconds recommended)
8. Test with 2-3 leads first!

## Common First-Time Issues

‚ùå No emails sending ‚Üí Check SMTP credentials and "From Email" address
‚ùå Duplicate sends ‚Üí Verify IF node is filtering Send Status correctly
‚ùå [Name] not replaced ‚Üí Check lead sheet has "Name" column spelled exactly
‚ùå Sheet not updating ‚Üí Confirm "Google Sheets6" node points to correct sheet
‚ùå Emails going to spam ‚Üí Add delays (Wait node), use verified domain, warm up email account
‚ùå Loop running forever ‚Üí Check "Loop Over Items" batch size (default: 1 is correct)

## What to Test Before Running Campaign
‚úÖ Send 2-3 test emails to yourself
‚úÖ Verify personalization works ([Name] replaced correctly)
‚úÖ Check emails don't land in spam folder
‚úÖ Confirm Sheet updates with "SENT" status after send
‚úÖ Test that already-sent leads are skipped on second run
‚úÖ Verify email formatting (line breaks, HTML if used)
‚úÖ Test with empty Name field (should use "there" fallback)

# Step-by-Step Setup

## 1. Create Leads Google Sheet

- Create a new Google Sheet named "Leads"
- Add these column headers in row 1:
Name | Email | Send Status | Time
- Fill in your leads (leave Send Status and Time empty)
- Copy the sheet ID from the URL

## 2. Create Templates Google Sheet

- Create another sheet named "Templates" (can be in same file, different tab)
- Add these column headers:
Subject | Body
- Write 2-5 email templates using [Name] placeholder

Example Subject: Quick question about [Name]'s design workflow

Example Body: Hi [Name],\n\nI noticed your work in graphic design and wanted to reach out...

- Copy the sheet ID

## 3. Connect n8n Credentials

- Add Google Sheets OAuth credentials (sign in with Google)
- Add SMTP credentials for your email account
- Gmail: enable "App Password" in Google settings
- Custom domain: get SMTP details from hosting provider

## 4. Update Workflow Nodes

- In "Google Sheets" node (Leads):
- Select your Leads sheet
- Select the "Sheet1" tab (or your leads tab name)
- In "Google Sheets1" node (Templates):
- Select your Templates sheet
- Select the templates tab
- In "Send email" node: Set "From Email" to your sending address
- Verify SMTP credentials are selected
- In "Google Sheets6" node (Log Status): Already points to Leads sheet‚Äîjust verify it's selected

## 5. Configure Wait Time

- In "Wait" node: default is instant‚Äîchange to 30-60 seconds
- This prevents spam flags and respects rate limits
- For SendGrid/Mailgun: 10-30 seconds is safe

## 6. Test It

- Add 2 test leads with YOUR email addresses
- Click "Test workflow" button
- Check: emails received, personalization correct, Sheet updated to "SENT"
- Verify no duplicate sends if you run again

# üö´ GMAIL SMTP DOES NOT WORK!

Gmail rejects SMTP authentication for automated sending.
Even with App Passwords, it will fail.

## ‚úÖ WORKING OPTIONS:
‚Ä¢ SendGrid (100 emails/day free)
‚Ä¢ Mailgun (free tier)
‚Ä¢ Brevo (300 emails/day free)
‚Ä¢ Amazon SES (cheap, pay-as-you-go)
‚Ä¢ Custom domain SMTP (cPanel/Plesk hosting)
‚Ä¢ Resend.com
‚Ä¢ Postmark

## ‚ùå WON'T WORK:
‚Ä¢ Gmail SMTP ‚ùå
‚Ä¢ Yahoo SMTP ‚ùå
‚Ä¢ Outlook/Hotmail SMTP ‚ùå

## üéØ RECOMMENDED:
Start with SendGrid free tier
or use your web hosting SMTP

## ‚öôÔ∏è You MUST use a transactional email service!

user.name: Anir Agram
user.bio: Automation freelancer solving business challenges with n8n. From email sequences to API integrations and workflow optimization. I build solutions that save time and boost productivity. Let's connect. üîß

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.
